mapper.select: select * from reservation order by reservationDate desc
select * from reservation order by reservationDate desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}

select r.reservationNum, r.reservationDate, r.reservationNumber, r.reservationRequest, r.reservationNow, r.userNum, m.menuName, b.basketCount, b.basketPTotal from reservation r join basket b ON r.reservationNum = b.reservationNum join menu m ON b.menuNum = m.menuNum where r.reservationNum = #{reservationNum}
mapper.insert: insert into reservation(reservationDate, reservationNumber, reservationRequest, userNum) values(#{reservationDate}, #{reservationNumber}, #{reservationRequest}, #{userNum})
